title: It shall be permissible for the Project Proponent/s, to whom Special Township Project (1)ITP as per earlier Regulations has already been granted location clearance and / or LOI or the project is on-going wherein part Occupancy Certificate is granted (1) as per then prevailing Regulation before coming in to force of this Regulation
clause_text: It shall be permissible for the Project Proponent/s, to whom Special Township Project (1)ITP as per earlier Regulations has already been granted location clearance and / or LOI or the project is on-going wherein part Occupancy Certificate is granted (1) as per then prevailing Regulation before coming in to force of this Regulation. -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: It shall be permissible for the Project Proponent/s, to whom Special Township Project (1)ITP as per earlier Regulations has already been granted location clearance and / or LOI or the project is on-go
